alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 29 at 2:36AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible. The heaviest snowfall accumulations will be above 9500 feet in elevation. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
